items.title: Asian shares hold steady amid China stimulus, Japan rate fears hit Nikkei
items.description: The week is packed with major US economic data including a payrolls report that could decide whether the Federal Reserve delivers another outsized rate cut in November

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets to track mixed global cues at open; Nikkei down 4%
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian equity benchmark indices were likely headed for a muted start on Monday, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures, tracking weakness in major global markets.

items.title: Pullback expected for Nifty50; wait for correction? What analysts say
items.description: The Nifty Index has formed its first red candle on the daily charts, signaling a shift in momentum as some bearishness and profit booking have started to emerge

items.title: Stock Market Today: Sebi Board meet, Manba Fin IPO listing, Nikkei sinks 4%
items.description: At 6:32 AM, GIFT Nifty futures were trading about 38 points lower at 26,307 levels, indicating a negative opening compared to the last close of Nifty futures.

items.title: Canara Bk, Coal India are top buying bets by Osho Krishan of Angel One
items.description: Canara Bank has showcased a strong resurgence from the pivotal support of 200 SMA on the daily time frame chart and has bounced to witness a sloping channel breakout

items.title: Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi recommends buying these three stocks on Sep 30
items.description: The nearly three-month-long bearish phase in BANKBARODA appears to be nearing its end, as a bullish pattern emerges on the daily chart

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Adani Enterprises, RIL, Tata Motors, Zydus Life, Biocon
items.description: Stocks to watch: Tata Motors has begun construction of a Rs 9,000-crore plant in Tamil Nadu for manufacturing Jaguar Land Rover vehicles.

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO allotment: Check status, GMP, likely listing price
items.description: Once the allotment of KRN Heat Exchanger IPO is finalised, investors can check their status by visiting the official websites of BSE, NSE, or Bigshare Services

items.title: FIIs most bullish in 3 months, shows F&O data; Nifty eyes 4th monthly gain
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 30: FIIs long-short ratio in index futures jumped to 4.4:1; implying more than 4 long positions in index futures for every bet on the short side.

items.title: Manba Finance shares list at 25% premium over IPO price, near GMP forecast
items.description: Manba Finance shares listed at Rs 150 on the BSE and Rs 145 on the NSE, against the IPO issue price of Rs 120

items.title: India bond yields seen easing tracking US peers, quarter-end demand to aid
items.description: US yields fell on Friday after data showed inflation in the world's largest economy continued to ease, boosting the chances of yet another larger interest rate cut at the Federal Reserve

items.title: Sebi board meeting today: F&O rules, Hindenburg claims, employees complaint
items.description: Sebi board meeting today, Sept 30, will be the first meeting since allegations were pressed against Sebi Chairperson Madhabi Puri Buch by Hindenburg Research. Here's what to expect from the meeting

items.title: Avantel stock zooms over 12% in a day; up 118% in one year; check details
items.description: Gurugram based Avantel specialises in manufacturing wireless front-end satellite communication systems, signal processing, network management, and software development

items.title: This smallcap stock jumped 9% on its first data centre order win; details
items.description: Bajel Projects shares rose after the company announced that it has secured its first order for data centres.

items.title: Metals stocks glint in trade; Nifty Metal up over 1% on China stimulus
items.description: Metal stock surged after China lowered the mortgage rate. At around 9:28 AM, Nifty Metal was up 1.23 per cent at 10,188.3

items.title: Sebi board to meet today amid allegations against chairperson Buch
items.description: Board expected to informally address conflict of interest claims and employee grievances

items.title: After Sebi, Parliament committee to conduct CCI's performance review
items.description: The Public Accounts Committee of Parliament, chaired by Congress leader KC Venugopal, has decided to assess the performance of regulatory bodies established by Acts of Parliament this financial year

items.title: This BSE listed stock has zoomed 103% in 4 months; mull bonus issue
items.description: Bajaj Steel Industries hit a record high of Rs 2,978, zooming 18% on the BSE in Monday's intra-day trade as company's board is scheduled to meet on Thursday, October 3, 2024 to consider a bonus issue

items.title: Lupin share falls over 2% as USFDA issues 3 observations for Pithampur unit
items.description: Lupin share price fell after the United States Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) issued 3 observations for its Pithampur Unit-1, based in Madhya Pradesh.

items.title: Authum Invt hits 5% upper band as board okays stake buy in Prataap Snacks
items.description: Authum Investment's board approved the 42.31 per cent acquisition of Prataap Snacks

items.title: Arkade, Northern Arc, Kross, Western Carriers, Tolins Tyres hit new lows
items.description: Stock market crash: Kross share price slipped 6 per cent to Rs 207.50 in the intraday trade today, falling 14 per cent below its issue price of Rs 240 per share

items.title: Number 13 has been unlucky for stock markets in 2024; will history repeat?
items.description: Nifty trend in 2024: The NSE benchmark has corrected as and when the difference between the spot Nifty and its 200-DMA expanded beyond the 13%-mark. Here's all you need to know.

items.title: Market Crash: Why Sensex fell 950 pts, Nifty slipped below 25,900 intraday
items.description: Stock market crash today: The retreat in the India stock market comes on the back of consecutive fresh highs breached by the benchmarks Sensex and Nifty in the last couple of weeks

items.title: What drove this pharmaceutical stock's 4% increase today? Find out here!
items.description: Alembic Pharma share price surged after the USFDA issued establishment inspection report (EIR) for the inspection carried out at the company's Oral Solid Formulation Facility (F-I).

items.title: Final Day! Diffusion Engineers IPO ends today: GMP up 34%; should you bid?
items.description: Diffusion Engineers IPO has so far received a favourable response from investors, with bids for 24,42,32,032 shares against 65,98,500 shares offered, resulting in an oversubscription of 37.01 times

items.title: Reliance Infra up 7% as Calcutta HC upholds Rs 780 crore arbitration award
items.description: Calcutta High Court has upheld Rs 780 crore arbitration award in favour of Reliance Infrastructure in the West Bengal-based Damodar Valley Corporation dispute

items.title: Here's why Paras Defence shares surged up to 5% today; up 81% in six mths
items.description: Aerospace and Defence firm Paras Defence and Space Technologies share price today surged up to 4.7 per cent at Rs 1,119 per share after the company bagged an order worth Rs 303 crore from L&T
